QuestData.Title: A Standard Day for Azrajar
QuestData.Description: $n, the snakes are after our daft and barmy. Go back northwest to Deepfin Ridge and plant some do me good in that pot and pan pitch and toss of theirs.$B$BThey'll kick and prance away with their alderman's nails tucked between their nutmegs when they see that. Not that they've got any nutmegs mind you.
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: Plant a banner in his corpse!
QuestData.LogDescription: Plant the Alliance Standard in Fathom-Caller Azrajar's corpse.
QuestData.RewardText: Nice Uncle Bob of pokin' their general.$B$B<The lieutenant shakes her head and grins.>

Objectives.Objective: Banner planted in Fathom-Caller Azrajar's corpse
